ComicInfo.Penciller: Chris Eliopoulos,Erik Larsen,Chad Hunt,Victor Bridges,Erik Larsen,Chris Eliopoulos
ComicInfo.Summary: As She-Dragon successfully ends a Vicious Circle crime wave, Chris Robinson is dumped by Alex Wilde when he learns that he was Star. The battle between Dragon, Smasher, Thor, Herakles, and several other creatures is ended by Allgod, a near-omnipotent manifestation of the planet's 'Elder Gods.'
